Reset Calendar Apply to All Hotels La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Charleston Riverview Price Calendar , Room Rooms Guest Guests per Room | Edit Dates Price Calendar | Currency Currency / Previous Slide Next Slide , 11 Ashley Pointe Dr., Charleston SC 29407 US +1-843-556-5200 La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Charleston Riverview +1-843-556-5200 Featured Amenities Featured Amenities Featured Amenities All Amenities All Amenities (${ratingCount} reviews) Featured Amenities Featured Amenities Featured Amenities All Amenities All Amenities Hotel Policies Hotel Policies × Hotel Policies Newly Renovated Under Renovation Newly Opened × A Riverside Retreat in Charleston Contemporary hotel by the Ashley River, minutes from downtown Enjoy scenic views of the Ashley River and thoughtful amenities at La Quinta by Wyndham Charleston – Riverview. Conveniently located off the James Island Expressway, our pet-friendly hotel is just three miles from historic downtown Charleston. Surrounded by restaurants, we also offer easy access to the College of Charleston, The Citadel, and Charleston International Airport (CHS). Whether work or vacation brings you to the South Carolina area, you'll appreciate our free WiFi and breakfast, outdoor pool, and comfortable guest rooms. ® Everything for a Bright Stay Relax with free breakfast and WiFi—plus, a pool and laundry facilities Our everyday essentials and signature Here for You service shine bright. Wake up with a free Bright Side Breakfast of eggs, waffles, fresh fruit, and more to get energized for your day. Keep connected with free WiFi, go for a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool, and grab your favorite snacks at our Bright Side Market. We also offer laundry facilities and paid parking during your stay. Unwind in one of our non-smoking guest rooms, featuring a flat-screen HDTV, desk, coffee/tea maker, ironing amenities, and hair dryer. ® Discover Charleston Stroll the historic streets, enjoy comfort food, or hit the links Founded in 1670, this charming port city is known for its Southern hospitality, unbelievable cuisine, and historic flair (think cobblestone streets, horse-drawn carriages, and antebellum architecture). Take a walking tour of the city, visit landmarks like Fort Sumter, and savor the views from Waterfront Park. You can also peruse the Charleston City Market for local eats and handcrafted products, play golf at a championship-caliber course, or mingle with sea turtles at the South Carolina Aquarium. For purposes of these terms and conditions “Public Internet Rate” means a Room Rate that is Viewable and Bookable (each as defined below) on another website for the same hotel, same room type, same number of guests, same currency and for the same date(s) as the hotel, room type, number of guests, currency and date(s) you booked. For purposes of these terms and conditions, a “Viewable” Room Rate means one for a hotel brand and/or specific hotel and location, which information the general public can view prior to booking, and a “Bookable” Room Rate means that one that is available and can be reserved online. To be eligible to receive the Best Rate Deal: (1) you must have a Wyndham reservation confirmation number; (2) you must complete and submit the online no later than (a) 24 hours after booking your room via one (1) of the methods described above; and (b) 48 hours prior to the hotel’s check-in time; and (3) Wyndham customer service agents must be must be able to verify, to their satisfaction, that (a) the Public Internet Rate in question exists at the time of claim processing, and (b) the claim otherwise meets, and has been completed and submitted in accordance with, all terms and conditions of this program. claim form For clarity, and without limiting any of these terms and conditions, if your original reservation was made within 48 hours of the hotel’s check-in time, you will not be eligible to receive a Best Rate Deal under these terms and conditions. All reservations must be for personal use only and booked by the guest who will actually be staying at the hotel. Reservations booked by brokers or agents will not qualify. Wyndham recommends that the email confirmation of any Room Rate change be presented to the hotel by the guest at check-in.
